Index.meta_description: Create and customize chat interfaces that connect to Axie Studio flows. Build professional AI-powered customer support experiences.

Hero.title: Build Professional AI Chat Interfaces for Your Business
Hero.description: Create custom-branded chat experiences that connect seamlessly to your Axie Studio AI flows. Deploy instantly, customize completely, and engage customers with intelligent conversations.

Features.section_title: Everything You Need for Professional Chat Experiences
Features.section_description: Build, customize, and deploy AI-powered chat interfaces that represent your brand and connect to your Axie Studio flows.
Features.feature_description: Complete control over your chat interface appearance with customization options for colors, logos, and messaging.

Pricing.section_description: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. All plans include core features with no hidden fees.

FAQ.question: How do I create my first chat interface?
FAQ.answer: Creating your first chat interface is simple! Sign up for an account, navigate to your dashboard, and click 'Create New Chat Interface'. Customize your branding, connect your Axie Studio flow endpoint, and deploy instantly. Your chat interface will be live and ready to engage customers.
FAQ.question2: Can I customize the appearance of my chat interface?
FAQ.answer2: Absolutely! You have complete control over your chat interface appearance. Customize colors, logos, welcome messages, placeholder text, fonts, and more. Make it perfectly match your brand identity.
FAQ.question3: How does the Axie Studio integration work?
FAQ.answer3: Simply provide your Axie Studio flow API endpoint and API key in the chat interface settings. Your chat interface will automatically connect to your AI flows, enabling intelligent conversations with your customers.
FAQ.question4: Is there a limit on messages or conversations?
FAQ.answer4: Our Free plan includes generous limits for personal projects. Premium and Enterprise plans offer higher limits and additional features. Check our pricing page for detailed information about message limits and features.
FAQ.question5: Can I use my own domain?
FAQ.answer5: Yes! Premium and Enterprise plans support custom domains. You can host your chat interfaces on your own domain for a seamless brand experience.

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Customer Experience?

validation.name_min: Name must be at least 3 characters
validation.name_max: Name must be less than 50 characters
validation.slug_min: Slug must be at least 3 characters
validation.slug_max: Slug must be less than 50 characters
validation.slug_format: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.brand_name_max: Brand name must be less than 50 characters
validation.color_format: Must be a valid hex color
validation.welcome_message_max: Welcome message must be less than 200 characters
validation.placeholder_text_max: Placeholder text must be less than 100 characters

FeaturesSection.subtitle: Platform Features
FeaturesSection.title: Everything You Need for Professional Chat Experiences
FeaturesSection.description: Build, customize, and deploy AI-powered chat interfaces that represent your brand and connect to your Axie Studio flows.
FeaturesSection.custom_branding_description: Complete control over your chat interface appearance. Customize colors, logos, messages, and styling to match your brand identity perfectly.
FeaturesSection.realtime_conversations_description: Instant messaging with your customers powered by Axie Studio AI flows. Provide immediate support and engagement 24/7.
FeaturesSection.axie_integration_description: Seamlessly connect to your existing Axie Studio AI flows. No complex setup required - just enter your API endpoint and you're ready.
FeaturesSection.instant_deployment_description: Get a unique public URL for each chat interface. Share with customers immediately or embed on your website with zero configuration.
FeaturesSection.analytics_insights_description: Monitor conversation metrics, track customer engagement, and analyze chat performance with built-in analytics dashboard.
FeaturesSection.enterprise_security_description: Bank-level security with encrypted conversations, secure API connections, and compliance-ready data handling for enterprise use.

HowItWorksSection.subtitle: How It Works
HowItWorksSection.title: From Setup to Success in Minutes
HowItWorksSection.description: Get your professional chat interface up and running with our simple three-step process.
HowItWorksSection.step1_description: Enter your Axie Studio flow endpoint and API key. Test the connection to ensure everything works perfectly.
HowItWorksSection.step2_description: Upload your logo, set brand colors, customize messages, and preview your chat interface in real-time.
HowItWorksSection.step3_description: Get your unique chat URL instantly. Share with customers, embed on your website, or integrate into your workflow.

BenefitsSection.subtitle: Why Choose Axie Studio Chat Builder
BenefitsSection.title: Transform Your Customer Experience
BenefitsSection.description: Join hundreds of businesses already using our platform to deliver exceptional customer support.
BenefitsSection.reduce_costs_description: Automate customer inquiries with AI-powered responses, reducing support ticket volume by up to 70%.
BenefitsSection.improve_satisfaction_description: Provide instant 24/7 support with consistent, accurate responses that maintain your brand voice.
BenefitsSection.scale_business_description: Handle unlimited conversations simultaneously without adding support staff or infrastructure.
BenefitsSection.brand_consistency_description: Every interaction reflects your brand with customized colors, messaging, and professional appearance.
BenefitsSection.quick_implementation_description: Deploy in minutes, not weeks. No technical expertise required - just connect and customize.
BenefitsSection.enterprise_ready_description: Built for businesses of all sizes with security, analytics, and scalability features included.

TestimonialsSection.subtitle: Testimonials
TestimonialsSection.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
TestimonialsSection.description: See what our customers are saying about their experience with our chat interface builder.
